slides.title: Collaborative Filtering
slides.content:
# Collaborative Filtering ğŸ‘¥

## Concept

Users who agreed in past will agree in future.

## Types

### User-based
Find similar users, recommend their items.

### Item-based
Find similar items to user's history.

## Matrix Factorization

- Decompose user-item matrix
- Latent factors
- SVD, NMF

> ğŸ¯ CF works without item features!

slides.title: Content-Based
slides.content:
# Content-Based Filtering ğŸ“„

## Concept

Recommend items similar to what user liked before.

## Features

- Item attributes
- Text (TF-IDF, embeddings)
- Categories, tags

## Pros/Cons

| Pros | Cons |
|------|------|
| No cold start (items) | Limited diversity |
| Explainable | User cold start |
| Works with few users | Feature engineering |
